name: Letter Invaders
description:
Letter Invaders is a fast paced shooter inspired by space invaders. Fight your way through waves of Letter enemies who have rallied against you under the lead of the big Y. You and the few keys still loyal to you (B, X, A, P and Space) have to win to ensure the safety of your keyboard! Dying will only improve your character, so no need to quit after one round!

Controls

Left = X

Right = B

Small bullet = A

Big bullet = Space

Pause = P

Theme

Well... the game is a fast paced shooter where the amount of bullets will cause chaos in the game (:

Credits

Tools used:

Godot, Auxy Pro and Bfxr

Images used:

The cursor: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Mano_cursor.svg

Music

The music was written by me, you can download it and use it for anything you want via this link: https://soundcloud.com/user-341294975/letter-invaders-theme
